A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was so terrible. I am actually surprised it has 50% fan approval rating. The story was slow and boring. The plot holes were everywhere and forced\, and the cringe worthy humor just made things worse. Rose/Finn side plot was a boring waste of screen time and poor Luke. Rian Johnson must hate Luke and all things Skywalker. Next on the Disney list is\, Solo: A Star Wars Story. Man I hope Chewie is awesome in that movie and still an omnivore.
